casebody.data:
AMERICAN PROPERTIES GROUP, LLC, as trustee of the 7803 Berkshire Pines Drive Land Trust, Appellant,
v.
U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, as trustee ON BEHALF OF the HOLDERS OF the HARBORVIEW MORTGAGE LOAN TRUST 2006-1 MORTGAGE LOAN PASS-THROUGH CERTIFICATES SERIES 2006-1, Appellee. Case No. 2D17-73 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed March 14, 2018.

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
